seo: 校园,安校易,管理系统,任意文件上传漏洞
seo_en: Campus, Safety School Easy, Management System, Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
summary: 检测校园(安校易)管理系统是否存在任意文件上传漏洞，该漏洞可能导致未经授权的文件上传和潜在的安全风险。
summary_en: Detect whether the Campus (Safety School Easy) Management System has an arbitrary file upload vulnerability, which may lead to unauthorized file uploads and potential security risks.
